var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}

searchUrl:
<js>
//md5åŠ å¯†å¼€å§‹
var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & y) | ((~x) & z)
}
var G = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & z) | (y & (~z))
}
var H = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x ^ y ^ z)
}
var I = function(x, y, z) {
    return (y ^ (x | (~z)))
}
var FF = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var GG = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var HH = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var II = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var convertToWordArray = function(string) {
    var lWordCount;
    var lMessageLength = string.length;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempOne = lMessageLength + 8;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempTwo = (lNumberOfWordsTempOne - (lNumberOfWordsTempOne % 64)) / 64;
    var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWordsTempTwo + 1) * 16;
    var lWordArray = Array(lNumberOfWords - 1);
    var lBytePosition = 0;
    var lByteCount = 0;
    while (lByteCount < lMessageLength) {
        lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
        lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
        lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (string.charCodeAt(lByteCount) << lBytePosition));
        lByteCount++
    }
    lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
    lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
    lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80 << lBytePosition);
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 2] = lMessageLength << 3;
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 1] = lMessageLength >>> 29;
    return lWordArray
};
var wordToHex = function(lValue) {
    var WordToHexValue = "",
    WordToHexValueTemp = "",
    lByte, lCount;
    for (lCount = 0; lCount <= 3; lCount++) {
        lByte = (lValue >>> (lCount * 8)) & 255;
        WordToHexValueTemp = "0" + lByte.toString(16);
        WordToHexValue = WordToHexValue + WordToHexValueTemp.substr(WordToHexValueTemp.length - 2, 2)
    }
    return WordToHexValue
};
var uTF8Encode = function(string) {
    string = string.replace(/\x0d\x0a/g, "\x0a");
    var output = "";
    for (var n = 0; n < string.length; n++) {
        var c = string.charCodeAt(n);
        if (c < 128) {
            output += String.fromCharCode(c)
        } else if ((c > 127) && (c < 2048)) {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 6) | 192);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        } else {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 12) | 224);
            output += String.fromCharCode(((c >> 6) & 63) | 128);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        }
    }
    return output;
};
function md5(string) {
    var x = Array();
    var k, AA, BB, CC, DD, a, b, c, d;
    var S11 = 7,
    S12 = 12,
    S13 = 17,
    S14 = 22;
    var S21 = 5,
    S22 = 9,
    S23 = 14,
    S24 = 20;
    var S31 = 4,
    S32 = 11,
    S33 = 16,
    S34 = 23;
    var S41 = 6,
    S42 = 10,
    S43 = 15,
    S44 = 21;
    string = uTF8Encode(string);
    x = convertToWordArray(string);
    a = 0x67452301;
    b = 0xEFCDAB89;
    c = 0x98BADCFE;
    d = 0x10325476;
    for (k = 0; k < x.length; k += 16) {
        AA = a;
        BB = b;
        CC = c;
        DD = d;
        a = FF(a, b, c, d, x[k + 0], S11, 0xD76AA478);
        d = FF(d, a, b, c, x[k + 1], S12, 0xE8C7B756);
        c = FF(c, d, a, b, x[k + 2], S13, 0x242070DB);
        b = FF(b, c, d, a, x[k + 3], S14, 0xC1BDCEEE);
        a = FF(a, b, c, d, x[k + 4], S11, 0xF57C0FAF);
        d = FF(d, a, b, c, x[k + 5], S12, 0x4787C62A);

(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
var discover = [];
var showR18 = false;
var push = (title, url, style) => {
    discover.push({
        title: title,
        url: url,
        style: {
            layout_flexGrow: 1,
            layout_flexBasisPercent: style
        }
    });
};
var addSlots = (count, style) => {
    var remainder = count % 3;
    var slotsAdd = remainder === 0 ? 0 : 3 - remainder;
    for (var i = 0; i < slotsAdd; i++) {
        push("", null, style);
    }
};
push("ä¹¦æ¶", null, 1);
try {
    var favored = java.ajax(`${baseUrl}/api/user/favored`);
    if (favored.includes("Tokenä¸åˆæ³•æˆ–è€…è¿‡æœŸ")) {
    	   showR18 = false;
        push("è´¦å·æœªç™»å½•", null, 0.25);
        addSlots(1, 0.25);
    } else {
    	   showR18 = true;
    	   push("é˜…è¯»å†å²", "/api/user/read-history?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=30", 0.25);
        var favoredData = JSON.parse(favored).favoredWeb;
        favoredData.forEach(item => {
            push(item.title, `/api/user/favored-web/${item.id}?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=30&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=update`, 0.25);
        });
        addSlots(1 + favoredData.length, 0.25);
    }
} catch (e) {
	   showR18 = false;
    push("æœªçŸ¥é”™è¯¯", null, 0.25);
    addSlots(1, 0.25);
}
push("æ¥æº", null, 1);
var providers = ["å…¨éƒ¨", "kakuyomu", "syosetu", "novelup", "hameln", "pixiv", "alphapolis"];
providers.forEach(provider => {
    var url = provider === "å…¨éƒ¨" ? 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${providers.slice(1).join('%2C')}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0` : 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${provider}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(provider, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(providers.length, 0.25);
push("ç±»å‹", null, 1);
var types = ["å…¨éƒ¨", "è¿è½½ä¸­", "å·²å®Œç»“", "çŸ­ç¯‡"];
types.forEach((type, index) => {
    var url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=${index}&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(type, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(types.length, 0.25);
push("åˆ†çº§", null, 1);
var levels = showR18 ? ["å…¨éƒ¨", "ä¸€èˆ¬å‘", "R18"] : ["å…¨éƒ¨", "ä¸€èˆ¬å‘"];
levels.forEach((level, index) => {
    var url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=${index}&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(level, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(levels.length, 0.25);
push("æ’åº", null, 1);
var sorts = ["æ›´æ–°", "ç‚¹å‡»"];
sorts.forEach((sort, index) => {
    var url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=${index}`;
    push(sort, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(sorts.length, 0.25);
JSON.stringify(discover);
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
var login = () => {
    var username = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("è´¦å·");
    var password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("å¯†ç ");
    var res = java.post(
        `${baseUrl.replace('n', 'auth')}/api/v1/auth/login`,
        JSON.stringify({
            username: username,
            password: password,
            app: "legado"
        }),
        {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
    );
    source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify({
        Authorization: `Bearer ${res.body()}`
    }));
}
login();
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: authors..name
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var initUrl = book.bookUrl;
var url = initUrl.includes('api/novel') ? initUrl : initUrl.replace('/novel/', '/api/novel/');
var body = initUrl.includes('api/novel') ? result : java.ajax(url);
if (body.includes('IDä¸åˆé€‚ï¼Œåº”å½“ä½¿ç”¨')) {
    var match = body.match(/\/\w+\/[\w-]+/);
    url = `${book.origin}/api/novel${match}`;
    body = java.ajax(url);
}
if (body.includes("Tokenä¸åˆæ³•æˆ–è€…è¿‡æœŸ")) {
    java.toast("å½“å‰ä¼šè¯å·²å¤±æ•ˆï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°ç™»å½•");
}
java.put('url', url);
body;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
var value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable());
var data = JSON.parse(result);
var cnIntro = data.introductionZh;
var jpIntro = data.introductionJp;
var intro = cnIntro ? (value === '5' ? jpIntro : ['6', '8'].includes(value) ? cnIntro + "\n‎\n" + jpIntro : ['7', '9'].includes(value) ? jpIntro + "\n‎\n" + cnIntro : cnIntro) : jpIntro;
var timeStamp = '{{$.toc[-1].createAt}}' || '{{$.syncAt}}';
intro = '  ğŸ“¬æœ€è¿‘' + ('{{$.toc[-1].createAt}}' ? 'æ›´æ–°' : 'åŒæ­¥') + 'ï¼š' + java.timeFormat(timeStamp * 1000) + '\n‎\n' + intro;
intro;
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name:
<js>
var value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable());
var data = JSON.parse(result);
var name = value === '5' ? data.titleJp : data.titleZh || data.titleJp;
name;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var token = source.getLoginHeader();
update(baseUrl, token);
var value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable());
var get = /^[1-9]$/.test(value) ? value : '1';
var config = {
    1: 'sakuraParagraphs',
    2: 'gptParagraphs',
    3: 'youdaoParagraphs',
    4: 'baiduParagraphs',
    5: 'paragraphs'
};
var data = JSON.parse(result);
var content = data[config[get]] || data[config[1]] || data[config[2]] || data[config[3]] || data[config[4]] || data[config[5]];
if (['6', '7', '8', '9'].includes(get)) {
    var cnContent = data[config[1]] || data[config[2]] || data[config[3]] || data[config[4]];
    var jpContent = data[config[5]];
    if (cnContent) {
        if (['8', '9'].includes(get)) {
            var res = java.post(
                'https://static.kksk.io/api/kanji',
                JSON.stringify({"content": format(regex(jpContent))}),
                {"Content-Type": "application/json"}
            );
            var kanji = JSON.parse(res.body());
            jpContent = jpContent.map(text => annotate(text, kanji));
        }
        var type = ['6', '8'].includes(get);
        content = jpContent.flatMap((jp, i) => {
            if (!((jp || '').trim() && (cnContent[i] || '').trim())) return [];
            var pair = type ? [cnContent[i], jp] : [jp, cnContent[i]];
            return pair.filter(Boolean).concat(i === jpContent.length - 1 ? [] : '\u200B');
        }).filter(Boolean);
    } else {
        content = jpContent;
    }
}
format(regex(content));
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
var providers = {
    kakuyomu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?kakuyomu\.jp\/works\/(\d+)/,
    syosetu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(ncode|novel18)\.syosetu\.com\/(\w+)/,
    novelup: /(?:https?:\/\/)?novelup\.plus\/story\/(\d+)/,
    hameln: /(?:https?:\/\/)?syosetu\.org\/novel\/(\d+)/,
    pixiv: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/series\/(\d+)|www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/show\.php\?id=(\d+))/,
    alphapolis: /(?:https?:\/\/)?www\.alphapolis\.co\.jp\/novel\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/,
    sakura: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(?:books\d?\.fishhawk\.top|n\.novelia\.cc)\/(?:api\/)?novel\/(\w+)\/([\w-]+)/
};
var url;
for (var provider in providers) {
    var match = key.match(providers[provider]);
    if (match) {
        var providerId = provider === 'sakura' ? match[1] : provider;
        var novelId = provider === 'alphapolis' ? `${match[1]}-${match[2]}` : provider === 'pixiv' ? (match[3] ? `s${match[3]}` : match[2]) : (match[2] || match[1]);
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel/${providerId}/${novelId}`;
        break;
    }
}
if (!url) {
    url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel?page=${page-1}&pageSize=20&query=${key}&provider=kakuyomu,syosetu,novelup,hameln,pixiv,alphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=1`;
}
url;
</js>

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {

	result=''
}else {
bid=java.hexDecodeToString(result).split(",")[0]
cid=java.hexDecodeToString(result).split(",")[1];
t=chapter.tag.match(/\|\s+(.*)/)[1];
if(chapter.isVip()){
	url=`{{h}}content.php?bookId=${bid}&chapterId=${cid},{"headers":{"tokens": "${token}","chapterTime": "${t}"}}`

   r = String(java.ajax(

    ));
    c = org.jsoup.Jsoup
        .parse(r)
        .select('main#c-' + cid)
        .html();
        c=String(c).replace(/<\/?p>/g,'')
}c
}

var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);

            if (!(response && response.data)) {}

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);

                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {

                        };

                            style: {

                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({

                    }
                });

        }

    try {

        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);

        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : 'æœªçŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·';
        infoData = [{

            }

        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {

}

var style_list = [];
try {

<js>

let limit = Number(baseUrl.match(/limit=(\d+)/)[1]);
let commentTotal  =  Number(java.getString("$.data.commentTotal"));
let page = Math.ceil(commentTotal/limit);
let p = (Number(baseUrl.match(/offset=(\d+)/)[1])/limit)+1;
function getPlainText(cl) {
    let output = "";
    let cllen = cl.length;
    let sss = String(source.getVariable());
    let re = /^([\[\]æ©˜ç³–ç´«ç³–]|å—‘åˆ°äº†|kswl|\d+\.\d+\.\d+|[1234567890ä¸€äºŒä¸‰å››äº”å…­ä¸ƒå…«ä¹å]+åˆ·|æ‰“å¡)+$|ä¸ºè¥é€ æ›´å¥½çš„è¯„è®ºç¯å¢ƒï¼Œ/;
    let sre = sss.match(/å±è”½ã€(.*?)ã€‘/)?.[1] ?? null;
    sre = sre ? new RegExp(sre.replace(/,/g, '|'), 'g') : null;    
    let plen = 0;
    let validCount = 0;

    for (let i in cl) {
        let c = cl[i];
        let reply = (c?.replyAll ?? c?.reply);
        let rl = [];
        if (re.test(c.commentBody ?? c.commentbody) || (sre ? sre.test(c.commentBody ?? c.commentbody) : null)) {
            cllen--;
            plen++;
            continue;
        }
        
        // å¤„ç†å›å¤
        let replyTotal = Number(c.replyTotal);
if(replyTotal > 5 && /â—ç¼“å­˜å›å¤/.test(sss)) { 	
	let replyUrl = "https://android.jjwxc.net/comment/getReplyList";   
    let offset = 5;
    let limit = replyTotal; 
    let replyBody = `versionCode=444&novelId=${c.novelId}&chapterId=${c.chapterId}&commentId=${c.commentId}&offset=${offset}&limit=${limit}&isBackend=2&token=${getToken()}`;
        let replyPost = {
            "method": "POST",
            "body": replyBody
        }
        let replyList = java.ajax(replyUrl+","+JSON.stringify(replyPost));     
        replyList = JSON.parse(replyList).data;
        reply = reply.concat(replyList);                  
    }


        for (let j in reply) {
            let r = reply[j];
            if (re.test(r.replyBody ?? r.commentbody) || (sre ? sre.test(r.replyBody ?? r.commentbody) : null)) {
                continue;
            }
            
            let authorTag = (r?.isAuthor === "1" ? "ğŸ‘‘" : "ğŸ“œ")+r.floor+"æ¥¼ ";
            
            rl.push({
                text: `${authorTag} ${r.replyAuthor ?? r.commentauthor} (${(!r.comment_date_time ? undefined : java.timeFormat(r.comment_date_time *1000)) ?? (r.replyDate || r.commentdate)})\n ${replaceEmoticons(r.replyBody ?? r.commentbody)}`
            });
        }
                               
        // æ„å»ºä¸»è¯„è®º
        let authorTag = "";
        if (c?.isAuthor === "1") {
            authorTag = "ğŸ‘‘";
        } else if (c?.bulletinComment === "1") {
            authorTag = "ğŸ“¢";
        } else {
            authorTag = "ğŸ‘¤";
        }

        // ä¸»è¯„è®ºå¤´éƒ¨ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä½œè€…ã€æ—¶é—´ã€è®¢é˜…ã€äº’åŠ¨æ•°æ®ï¼‰
             
        let header = `${authorTag} ${c.commentAuthor ?? c.commentauthor} `;
        let time = ` ğŸ“†${(!c.comment_date_time ? undefined : java.timeFormat(c.comment_date_time * 1000)) ?? (c.commentDate || c.commentdate || '')}`
        // è®¢é˜…ä¿¡æ¯     
        if (c.subscriptionicon) {
            if (c.subscriptionrate) {
                header += ` ğŸ“–${c.subscriptionrate}`;
            } else if (c.subscriptionicon.includes("rate_novelallbuy")) {
                header += ` ğŸ“–100%`;
            }
        }

        // äº’åŠ¨æ•°æ®
        header += ` \nğŸ‘${c.agreenum ?? "0"}`;
        if (c.commentMark) header += ` â­ï¸${c.commentMark}`;
        
        output += "\n"+header + time+ "\n";
        output += `${replaceEmoticons(c.commentBody ?? c.commentbody)}`;




        // å›å¤å†…å®¹
        if (rl.length > 0) {
            output += "\n‎\nğŸ” å›å¤å†…å®¹:\n";
            rl.forEach(reply => {
                output += `  ${reply.text}\n`;
            });
        }
        if(replyTotal > 5 && !/â—ç¼“å­˜å›å¤/.test(sss)){
        output= output.replace(/\n$/,'')+getImage(replyTotal,c.novelId,c.chapterId,c.commentId)
        }
	
        output += "\n‎\n";
        validCount++;
    }

    // æ·»åŠ ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯
    let stats = `ğŸ·æœ¬ç« å…±æœ‰${commentTotal}æ¡è¯„è®º | å…±æœ‰${page}é¡µ\nğŸ’¬å½“å‰ç¬¬${p}é¡µæ˜¾ç¤º ${validCount} æ¡è¯„è®º | å±è”½ ${plen} æ¡è¯„è®º`;
      
    return stats + "\n\n" + output;
}

    }

      }
    }
  
                
            }
          }
        ",
  "operationName": "getWorksList"
}

var body="";
if(chapter.isVip()){
body=JSON.parse(result).data
}else{
var cid=baseUrl.match(/\d+\/(\d+)/)[1]
body=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result)).select('main#c-'+cid).html();
}
body
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  var bookId=baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1]
 result=java.ajax("https://wxapp.qidian.com/api/book/categoryV2?bookId="+bookId+"&_csrfToken=")
 var charts=[];
JSON.parse(result).data.vs.map(i=>{
i.cs.map(o=>{
var chart={"id":o.id,"title":o.cN,"v":o.sS==0,"t":o.uT+ "  " + o.cnt +"å­—"}
if(chart.v){
chart.url="http://qd.yyhydb-123546.top/api/content/qd?bid="+bookId+"&cid="+o.id+"&deviceId="+java.androidId()
}else{
chart.url="https://m.qidian.com/chapter/"+bookId+"/"+o.id+"/"
}
charts.push(chart);
})
})
 charts;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if (baseUrl.startsWith('data')) {
    let decodedData = String(java.hexDecodeToString(src));
    let [ruleStr, initialUrl] = decodedData.split('|');
    let finalUrl = initialUrl;
    let initialCount = 0;
    const finalCount = 10;
    while (initialCount < finalCount) {
            initialCount++;
            let Content = java.ajax(source.key + finalUrl);
            let thUrl = java.getString(ruleStr, Content);
            finalUrl = thUrl;
         if (!thUrl.includes('_')) break;
    }
    result = java.ajax(source.key + finalUrl);
    java.setContent(result);
}
result;
</js>
#content > :not(a)@html

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let pages = Array.from(java.getStringList('option@value', null, true));

var chapters = java.ajaxAll(pages).flatMap(m => {
    let chapterLists = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(m.body()).select('.section-list');
    return Array.from(chapterLists.get(1).select('a'));
});

var list = chapters.map((item, i) => {
    let url = String(item.attr('href'));
    if (!url) {
        let thUrl = i < chapters.length - 1 ? chapters[i+1].attr('href') : chapters[i-1].attr('href');
        let ruleStr = i < chapters.length - 1 ? "#prev_url@href" : "#next_url@href";
       if (String(thUrl)) url = "data:;base64," + java.base64Encode(ruleStr + "|" + thUrl) + ',{"type": "chapter"}';
    }
    //java.log(url)
    return { 
        name: item.text(), 
        Url: url
    };
});
list;
</js>
